price: 53. Nous lui donnâmes, par Notre grâce, son frère Aaron comme Prophète.
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥ مِن رَّحۡمَتِنَآ أَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ نَبِيّٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wawahabnā lahu min raḥmatinā akhāhu hārūna nabiyyan
